title: Realm of Gods Tier List
description: Discover the definitive tier list for Realm of Gods characters, ranked from S Tier to C Tier. Find out which divine beings reign supreme in the pantheon and which ones need divine intervention.
heading: Realm of Gods Tier List
introText: Discover the definitive tier list for Realm of Gods characters, ranked from S Tier to C Tier. Find out which divine beings reign supreme in the pantheon and which ones need divine intervention.

data.itemDescription: The king of the gods, with unmatched control over lightning and sky, making him a formidable opponent
The all-father who possesses immense wisdom and magical prowess, excelling in both offense and defense
The sun god, whose power and influence are unparalleled, providing extraordinary support and damage
Queen of the gods, with powerful abilities that can turn the tide of battle
God of thunder, known for his brute strength and combat skills
Goddess of wisdom and war, offering strategic advantages and solid performance in battle
God of the underworld, with strong defensive capabilities and situational power
Goddess of love, providing good support and healing abilities
God of the sea, with strong area-of-effect attacks but limited in versatility
God of wine, with abilities that are more situational and less impactful
Messenger of the gods, fast and agile but lacking in significant offensive or defensive capabilities
God of fire and forge, with crafting skills but limited combat effectiveness
